item.title: Memory Allocation
item.description: - Memory allocation is a critical concept in computer programming.

item.title: Same Stop: Life after 26 years as a programmer for Apple
item.description: - After retiring from 26 years of programming work at Apple, the author finds himself drawn back to programming in his spare time.

item.title: Meta fined $1.3B over data transfers to U.S
item.description: - Meta (formerly known as Facebook) has been fined $1.3 billion by the European Union for transferring user data to the United States.

item.title: Meta AI announces Massive Multilingual Speech code, models for 1000+ languages
item.description: - Meta AI's MMS project expands speech technology to over 1,000 languages with a single multilingual speech recognition model, language identification models, pretrained models, and text-to-speech models.

item.title: Tell HN: Cancelling HP Instant Ink prevents cartridges from being used
item.description: - HP Instant Ink customers report that cancelling their subscription results in their printers refusing to use cartridges purchased from other sources.

item.title: Leaked government document shows Spain wants to ban end-to-end encryption
item.description: - Spain wants to ban encryption for EU-based service providers, according to a leaked document that reveals members' opinions on encryption regulation and scanning private messages for illegal content.

item.title: Severance payments at Wikimedia Foundation
item.description: - Katherine Maher, the outgoing CEO of the Wikimedia Foundation, received a severance package of $623,286 in 2021, in addition to her salary.

item.title: Modern work requires attention â€“ constant alerts steal it
item.description: - In the modern work environment, constant notifications and interruptions can steal precious attention needed to solve hard problems.

item.title: Malicious VSCode extensions with more than 45k installs
item.description: - CloudGuard Spectral discovered several malicious extensions on the Visual Studio Code (VSCode) marketplace, with these extensions allowing for theft of personally identifiable information (PII) and enabling of remote shell access to users' machines.

item.title: The Open Buddhist University
item.description: - The Open Buddhist University is a free website where you can take courses and learn about Buddhism.
